name: Escape From The Mansion (Foxerski)
description:
Escape From The Mansion is a 3D old-school game based on Wolfenstein 3D. You have to escape from the mansion by fighting your way to the Head of the mansion.

Controls:
WSAD - Move Forward, Backward, Left, Right
Left Mouse Button - Shoot
Right Mouse Button - Use Knife
R - Rage
Shift - Sprint

OST from the gameThe game is currently being balanced and updated. If you have any bugs or balance problems, download the newest version (1.3.2)
